text:
[Verse]
Skyline glow so high and bright
Neon signs that light the night
Crowded streets we feel the beat
Echoes in the endless heat

[Verse 2]
Footsteps dance on pavement ground
Music's pulse a city's sound
Laughter mixed with cars that zoom
Underneath the silver moon

[Chorus]
City lights they guide our way
In this town we'll never stray
Every corner sparks a dream
In the city's endless gleam

[Verse 3]
Boulevard where stories bloom
Every soul has found its room
Window panes reflect the stars
Dreamers came from near and far

[Bridge]
Under lights we’re all alive
In this place we truly thrive
Heartbeats sync with city's flow
Everywhere there's life to show

[Chorus]
City lights they guide our way
In this town we'll never stray
Every corner sparks a dream
In the city's endless gleam
title: City Lights
